data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Cần Thơ.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cần Thơ, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Cần Thơ, Vietnam by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, make the 26,260 believers in Cần Thơ to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,187,840 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Cần Thơ, Vietnam.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Bih people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Bih people know you.
Jesus, please help the 26,260 believers in the state of Cần Thơ to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Cần Thơ, Vietnam into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.section_summary:
the state of Cần Thơ, Vietnam has a population of 1,214,100.

We estimate Cần Thơ has 26,260 people who might know Jesus, 97,386 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,090,454 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 97,386 people in the state of Cần Thơ who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.
